answers.answer: Probably your plug. I'm having very light spotting (brown and pink) and a little snot like (sorry, gross I know) discharge, and I had a sweep done on Thursday. Hopefully we're getting close! Good luck :)
Contractions are getting closer but I'm waiting for solid proof its time lol luckily hospital is very close

That's how my labor started with my first which is why I didn't know I was in labor I got checked the day before and thought I was still spotting the next day because of that but really I was in labor. Had horrible contractions and didn't know that's what it was because it was so bad in my back I didn't know they were real.
I was bleeding for 2days rhen had my son on day 4 after the sweep good luck

Music to my ears ladies, if you had contractions for weeks and learned to ignore them... Yeah totally can be the real thing, so I'm sitting here everyone in bed thinking hmmm couple squats won't hurt lol too bad my feet are so swollen!!! Bee sting itchy swollen painful feet... But tested several times and no preeclampsia.... Which is what I had with my first.

question: Update... 24 hours after sweep... Still having brown and red slimy discharge tmi sorry... Is it ok that I'm still spotting?? Still having contractions and cramping so maybe this is the beginning of the end? Gahhhhhh I'm so done!!!
title: How long did you spot after a sweep?
